# [Interview #608: Amsterdam Pancakes and Fries Report - jarno87, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=608#6)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Brandon noted that people will die in Tarmon Gai'don. We should not blame him.
